TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AnyEventHandler(object sender, BuildEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AnyEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs"> that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.AnyEventRaised"> event of a build.
